meanings.definition: A type of oil made from sesame seeds.
meanings.sent1: I used gingelly to cook my favorite dish.
meanings.sent2: The gingelly oil added a delicious flavor to the salad.
meanings.sent3: The gingelly oil slipped out of the bottle and made a slippery mess on the kitchen counter.
meanings.sent4: Her hair glistened like gingelly oil in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of gingelly filled the kitchen, making my mouth water.

meanings.definition: A plant of the genus Sesamum, cultivated for its seeds.
meanings.sent1: The farmer harvested gingelly from his fields.
meanings.sent2: The gingelly plant requires plenty of sunlight to grow well.
meanings.sent3: The gingelly plant waved in the breeze as if greeting the passing butterflies.
meanings.sent4: The field of gingelly plants looked like a sea of green waves.
meanings.sent5: The tiny gingelly seeds held the promise of a bountiful harvest.
